plugins.description: User-configurable hooks from .local.md files - create custom PreToolUse, PostToolUse, and Stop hooks via YAML configuration

plugins.description: Streamline git workflow with simple commands for committing, pushing, and creating pull requests

plugins.description: Schema-first development ecosystem with dual-spec workflows (OpenAPI + DB schema) for building production-ready applications

plugins.name: plugin-builder
